sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
moves onto an object
ali
is put onto it
, se premakne na neki predmet, tako da je ta pod tistim človekom ali stvarjo.

seg.quote: She spooned a portion of potato onto his plate.
I ran out onto the porch.

sense.def:
To get onto a bus, train or plane
pomeni vkrcati se na avtobus, vlak ali letalo.

To fasten one thing onto another
pomeni eno stvar pritrditi na neko drugo.

seg.quote: I bent a pin and tied it onto a piece of string.

sense.def:
To hold onto something
pomeni nekaj trdno držati.

To get onto a different subject
pomeni, da takrat, ko govorimo, zamenjamo témo pogovora.
